attributes.action: Start options year or ½a year earlier.Fill  some of lessons you drop with taxes.
attributes.background: Too many people leave school nowadays without the knowledge of how the world around them works. I believe we should teach things like how to pay taxes in schools.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
